name: Landing Page
samplePrompt: Draft a marketing landing page for a vacation service that is customizable and presented in beautiful HTML.

chunks.title: Hero Candidates
chunks.body:
1) Mountain landscape — nature / outdoors
https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1501785888041-af3ef285b470

2) Ocean waves / sea water
https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1507525428034-b723cf961d3e

3) Modern house exterior — architecture / home design
https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1568605114967-8130f3a36994

4) City skyline at dusk — urban architecture
https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1467269204594-9661b134dd2b

5) Working on laptop — workspace / productivity
https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1517430816045-df4b7de11d1d

chunks.title: Additional Images
chunks.body:
Nature / natural landscapes / outdoors — https://unsplash.com/s/photos/nature
Inspiration / abstract / conceptual — https://unsplash.com/s/photos/inspiration
Sunset / warm-light skies — https://unsplash.com/s/photos/sunset
Technology / futuristic — https://unsplash.com/s/photos/technology
Park / forest / greenery — https://unsplash.com/s/photos/park
City / urban / architecture — https://unsplash.com/s/photos/city
Wallpaper / hero backgrounds — https://unsplash.com/t/wallpapers

chunks.title: Target Audience
chunks.body:
• Families planning effortless vacations with smart suggestions.
• Solo travelers wanting safe, customized itineraries.
• Remote workers seeking AI‑tailored workations with strong Wi‑Fi.
• Adventure seekers open to dynamic recommendations.
• Budget travelers optimizing value with real‑time price insights.

chunks.title: Value Proposition
chunks.body:
• AI‑personalized itineraries in minutes (interests, budget, schedule).
• Live travel intelligence: pricing, weather, events.
• One‑click booking handoff to trusted partners.
• Seamless collaboration: invite friends/family to co‑plan.
• 24/7 assistance: adjust plans instantly while traveling.

chunks.title: Call‑To‑Action Ideas
chunks.body:
Primary CTA: "Plan with AI"
Secondary CTAs: "Explore Destinations", "Get Sample Itinerary", "See Family Deals"
Trust Builders: "No credit card required", "Free 7‑day trial", "Cancel anytime"

chunks.title: Brand Voice
chunks.body: Friendly, confident, and clear. Avoid jargon. Focus on outcomes and feelings—stress‑free planning, memorable experiences, smart savings. Keep sentences short and scannable.

chunks.title: Compliance & Privacy Notes
chunks.body:
• Be transparent about data sources and personalization signals.
• Provide an opt‑out for tracking and preference storage.
• Link to Privacy Policy and Terms near the footer CTAs.

chunks.title: SEO Keywords
chunks.body: ai trip planner, ai travel planner, personalized itinerary, family vacation planning, weekend getaway, workation planning, travel deals, real‑time travel insights
